column1: ["1 Pack Archanas Kitchen Rich Chocolate Cake Mix"
1 cup Cabbage (Patta Gobi/ Muttaikose) thinly sliced
1 cup Button mushrooms cut into quarters
1 teaspoon Kasuri Methi (Dried Fenugreek Leaves) crushed for garnish
3 Drumstick cut into 1 inch size pieces
200 grams Kaddu (Parangikai/ Pumpkin) skin peeled and chopped
1/4 cup Green beans (French Beans) finely chopped (optional)
2 tablespoons Spring Onion Greens finely chopped
1 teaspoon Salt and more to taste
1 tablespoon Goji berries or any other dried fruit
Whole Wheat Bread crumbs for coating
or any other thick country bread
1/2 cup Spinach baby spinach if available
1/8 cup Black olives pitted and halved
1 cup Arhar dal (Split Toor Dal) soaked in water for 2 hours
1/2 cup White Urad Dal (Split) soaked in water for 2 hours
2 cups Soy Chunks (Nuggets) boiled and squeezed well
1 teaspoon Whole Black Pepper Corns crushed
500 grams Colocasia root (Arbi) skin peeled and boiled
Extra Virgin Olive Oil to brush
1 cup Avocado salsa or Sour cream to serve
500 grams Ridge Gourd (Turai/ Peerkangai) cut into 1 inch cubes
2 cups Methi Leaves (Fenugreek Leaves) roughly chopped
2 Dry Red Chillies broken into halves
500 grams Seeraga (Jeeraga) Samba rice washed and soaked
1/4 cup Broccoli cut into small florets
1/2 cup Spring Onion Greens finely chopped
1/4 cup Coconut Sugar or raw sugar/powdered jaggery
1/4 cup Coconut Oil melted virgin (cold pressed)
1 cup Kabuli Chana (White Chickpeas) soaked for 8 hours
4 sprig Parsley leaves chopped (you can also use coriander)
1 kg Duck with skin cut into small pieces
3 Dry Red Chillies broken into two pieces
2 cups Coconut milk Semi Thick (2nd extract)
10 Indian borage (Doddapatre) cleaned washed and separated
Coriander (Dhania) Leaves a few sprigs finely chopped for garnish
Oil or ghee for frying paratha
2 cups Pearl onions (Sambar Onions) finely chopped
500 grams Tindora (Dondakaya/ Kovakkai) slit length wise
6 sprig Coriander (Dhania) Leaves chopped for garnish
1 cup Arhar dal (Split Toor Dal) or chana dal
2 tablespoons Cashew nuts soaked and ground to paste
1 Pizza base or whole wheat pizza
2 cups Chow chow (chayote squash) cut into cubes
30 grams Tamarind soaked in 1 cup of water
1 teaspoon Sesame (Gingelly) Oil or vegetable oil
3 sprig Spring Onion Greens for garnish
300 grams Spinach washed and finely chopped
1 cup Green Moong Dal (Whole) soaked overnight
1 Green Chillies finely chopped or slit
3 Green Bell Pepper (Capsicum) or any other colour of your choice
1/4 cup Spring Onion (Bulb & Greens) roughly chopped
1 Red Yellow or Green Bell Pepper (Capsicum) diced
1/2 Green zucchini quartered or thickly sliced
1 sprig Basil leaves or kaffir lime leaves
2 tablespoons Ghee plus more for shallow frying
3 Cardamom (Elaichi) Pods/Seeds peeled with only seeds
1 tablespoon Oil plus little more for brushing
1 cup White Urad Dal (Whole) soaked for atleast 8 hours
15 Whole Almonds (Badam) soaked and skin peeled
2 cups Fresh coconut chopped or grated
1/2 teaspoon Whole Black Peppercorns coarsely pounded
2 Green bell peppers cut into small cubes
1 Red Bell pepper (Capsicum) cut into small cubes
1 Yellow Bell Pepper (Capsicum) cut into small cubes
1 cup All Purpose Flour (Maida) plus more for dusting
400 grams Green beans (French Beans) cut into 1 inch pieces
1 teaspoon Mint Leaves (Pudina) dried or fresh
1/2 teaspoon Whole Black Peppercorns freshly ground
1 Dry Red Chilli broken and deseeded
3 cups Cabbage (Patta Gobi/ Muttaikose) finely minced
Extra Virgin Olive Oil for pan frying
1/4 cup Spring Onion (Bulb & Greens) finely chopped with leaves
3-4 cups Malabar Spinach Leaves as well as stalks chopped into big pieces
1 cup Kaddu (Parangikai/ Pumpkin) cut into big pieces
1/2 cup Mooli/ Mullangi (Radish) cut into small pieces
